UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Potent and rapid bactericidal action of alyteserin-1c and its [E4K] analog against multidrug-resistant strains of Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Ahmed E, Pál T, Sonnevend A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25726(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>250µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=20µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM8(MIC=5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM75(MIC=2.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM8(MBC=10µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM35(MBC=5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM124(MBC=20µM)
